name: Dazzling Polyhedron
description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Anemo DMG.
Usage(s): 3
When this Summon is on the field: Opposing character(s) take +1 Anemo DMG.
When entering play and when the Action Phase begins: Create 1 Anemo Die.
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K105].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When this Summon is on the field:</color> Opposing character(s) take +1 $[K105].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>When entering play and when the Action Phase begins:</color> Create 1 <color=#80FFD7FF>$[K305]</color> Die.
